Uses of Interface
shabtay.coupon.system.facade.CouponClientFacade

  • Packages that use CouponClientFacade 
    Package Description
    shabtay.coupon.system.entry  
    shabtay.coupon.system.facade  

    • Uses of CouponClientFacade in shabtay.coupon.system.entry

      Methods in shabtay.coupon.system.entry that return CouponClientFacade 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CouponClientFacade CouponSystem.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, ClientType type)
      Method returns Facade (AdminFacade, CopmanyFacade, CustomerFacade), also invokes the Daily Coupon Expiration Task

    • Uses of CouponClientFacade in shabtay.coupon.system.facade

      Classes in shabtay.coupon.system.facade that implement CouponClientFacade 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdminFacade
      Class AdminFacade gives the administrator access to all the data of Customers and Companies able to create, remove,update, get coupon list, get company list, get customer list get company by name, get customer by name, get company by id, get customer by id
      class  CompanyFacade
      Class CompanyFacade gives the Company to perfrom the following actions: create new coupon, remove Coupon, update Coupon, get Coupon by Id, get Coupon by type, get Coupon by name, get all coupons, get coupons by date, get coupons by price
      class  CustomerFacade
      Class CustomerFacade gives the Customer to perform the following actions , after login was successfully: purchaseCoupon, getAllPurchasedCoupons, getAllPurchasedCouponsByType, getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice, getCouponInCustomerDB
      Methods in shabtay.coupon.system.facade that return CouponClientFacade 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CouponClientFacade CustomerFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      if login was successful customer is able to perform all methods in this class
      CouponClientFacade CouponClientFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password) 
      CouponClientFacade CompanyFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password) 
      CouponClientFacade AdminFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
